addPlayer

public boolean addPlayer(Player newPlayer)
Add a new player to the game. Will start a new round if successful.

Parameters:
newPlayer -
Returns:
True if successfully added newPlayer. Will return false if player already added.

removePlayer

public boolean removePlayer(Player oldPlayer)
Remove player from game. Will start a new round if successful.

Parameters:
oldPlayer - Player to be removed.
Returns:
True if successfully removed oldPlayer. Will return false if player was not in game.
